author: Lex Dreitser

changelog.release_notes:
Version 2.0: 
-Added Battery Meter 
-Added Accelerometer activated backlighting 
-Added 59 watchface images and twitter tags, Go Team Human!

description:
This series of watchfaces for the inexpensive pebble watch show you the current human population* (up to the minute) and much more.

New Features in Version 2.01
-59 Watchfaces
- Accelerometer triggered Nitro
- High Visibility Battery Gauge

The Only Team
Yankees, Mets, Red Sox, Jets, Patriots, Manchester, Liverpool it's all a construct. Sometimes we need a reminder of the game and what the teams really are. Inspired by gifted philosophers like Joe Rogan and Duncan Trussell.

I built an app because my "human teammates" built a watch and then this whole software around it - that lets you make apps. I did it using Pebble's native C based SDK on PebbleCloud using Github. Powerful Community! 

Creating customized, data-driven watch faces for social good is just something I do for our team. I love our team. 

I'll be honoring Team Human representatives with custom watchfaces and notifying them via twitter. There is no money in making these FREE watchfaces for me. It's for the benefit of our team.


*Calculations made based on estimates from wikipedia
title: Team Human
